FilmCircle.summary: The FilmCircle class. Represents a circle made of film. Contains methods for calculating perimeter and area.

Id.value: Gets or sets an ID of the current film circle.
Id.exception: Thrown when ID of the current circle is negative.

Radius.value: Gets or sets a radius of the current film circle.
Radius.exception: Thrown when radius of the current circle is not positive.

Constructor1.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FilmCircle class with default properties.

Constructor2.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FilmCircle class with the specified radius.
Constructor2.param: The radius of the current circle.

Constructor3.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FilmCircle class cut from .
Constructor3.param: The parent shape to cut a child shape.
The radius of the circle to be cut.

GetPerimeter.summary: Returns the perimeter of the current circle.
GetPerimeter.returns: The perimeter of the current circle.

GetArea.summary: Returns the area of the current circle.
GetArea.returns: The area of the current circle.

Equals.summary: Determines whether two FilmCircle instances are equal. Overrides the base method.
Equals.param: The object to compare with the current circle.
Equals.returns: true if the specified object is equal to the current circle; otherwise, false

GetHashCode.summary: Serves as the default hash function. Overrides the base method.
GetHashCode.returns: A hash code for the current circle.

ToString.summary: Returns a string that represents the current circle.
ToString.returns: A string that represents the current circle.

GetArea.returns: The area of the current rectangle.

Equals.summary: Determines whether two FilmRectangle instances are equal. Overrides the base method.
Equals.param: The object to compare with the current rectangle.
Equals.returns: true if the specified object is equal to the current rectangle; otherwise, false

GetHashCode.summary: Serves as the default hash function. Overrides the base method.

ToString.summary: Returns a string that represents the current rectangle.

Side1.value: Gets or sets a side of the current film triangle.
Side1.exception: Thrown when side of the current triangle is not positive.

Side2.value: Gets or sets a side of the current film triangle.
Side2.exception: Thrown when side of the current triangle is not positive.

Side3.value: Gets or sets a side of the current film triangle.
Side3.exception: Thrown when side of the current triangle is not positive.

Constructor1.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FilmTriangle class with default properties.

Constructor2.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FilmTriangle class with the specified side length.
Constructor2.param: The length of the side of triangle.
The length of the side of triangle.

The length of the side of triangle to be cut.
